AccountAwaitingSendPendingOperations.description: Please wait for the operation to go through.

AlgorandASANotOptInInRecipient.title: Recipient account has not opted in the selected ASA.

BluetoothRequired.title: Sorry, Bluetooth is disabled
BluetoothRequired.description: Please enable Bluetooth in your phone settings. ({{state}} state)

BtcUnmatchedApp.title: That's the wrong app
BtcUnmatchedApp.description: Please open the {{managerAppName}} app on your device.

CantOpenDevice.title: Sorry, connection failed
CantOpenDevice.description: Your Ledger device must be unlocked and in range to use Bluetooth.

CantScanQRCode.title: Could not scan this QR code: auto-verification not supported by this address.

ConnectAppTimeout.title: Oops, no device found
ConnectAppTimeout.description: Please make sure your {{productName}} is unlocked with Bluetooth enabled.

ConnectManagerTimeout.title: Oops, manager connection failed
ConnectManagerTimeout.description: Please make sure your {{productName}} is unlocked with Bluetooth enabled.

ClaimRewardsFeesWarning.title: The rewards are smaller than the estimated fees to claim them.

CompoundLowerAllowanceOfActiveAccountErr.title: You cannot reduce the amount approved while having an active deposit.

CosmosBroadcastCodeUnauthorized.title: Unauthorized signature
CosmosBroadcastCodeUnauthorized.description: This account is not authorized to sign this transaction.

CosmosBroadcastCodeInsufficientFunds.title: Insufficient funds
CosmosBroadcastCodeInsufficientFunds.description: Please make sure the account has enough funds.

CosmosBroadcastCodeInvalidAddress.title: Invalid address
CosmosBroadcastCodeInvalidAddress.description: Please check the address and try again.

CosmosBroadcastCodeUnknownAddress.title: Unknown address
CosmosBroadcastCodeUnknownAddress.description: Please check the address and try again.

CosmosBroadcastCodeInsufficientCoins.title: Insufficient funds
CosmosBroadcastCodeInsufficientCoins.description: Please increase the funds on the account.

CosmosBroadcastCodeMemoTooLarge.title: The Memo field is too long
CosmosBroadcastCodeMemoTooLarge.description: Please reduce the size of the memo text and try again.

CosmosStargateFeb2021Warning.description: The Cosmos blockchain is planning for an on-chain update on Feb 18th. Coming Ledger Live 2.22.0 will continue supporting ATOM.

DeviceAppVerifyNotSupported.title: Open Manager to update this app
DeviceAppVerifyNotSupported.description: The app verification is not supported.

DeviceHalted.title: Please restart your Ledger device and retry
DeviceHalted.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

DeviceOnDashboardExpected.title: Device not on Dashboard
DeviceOnDashboardExpected.description: Please return to the Dashboard on your device.

DisconnectedDevice.title: Sorry, it looks like your device was disconnected

DisconnectedDeviceDuringOperation.title: Sorry, it looks like your device was disconnected

ETHAddressNonEIP.title: Auto-verification not available: carefully verify the address.

Touch ID Error.title: Biometric authentication failed
Touch ID Error.description: Please use your password or reset the app.

Error.title: {{message}}
Error.description: Something went wrong. Please retry or contact Ledger Support if the problem persists.

FirmwareOrAppUpdateRequired.title: Firmware or app update needed
FirmwareOrAppUpdateRequired.description: Please use the Manager to uninstall all apps then check if a firmware update is available before reinstalling them.

GenuineCheckFailed.title: Device authentication failed
GenuineCheckFailed.description: Something went wrong. Please try again or contact Ledger Support if the problem persists.

HardResetFail.title: Sorry, could not reset
HardResetFail.description: Please try again or contact Ledger Support if the problem persists.

InvalidAddress.title: This is not a valid {{currencyName}} address

InvalidAddressBecauseDestinationIsAlsoSo.title: Destination and source accounts must not be the same.

LatestMCUInstalledError.title: Sorry, there's nothing to update
LatestMCUInstalledError.description: Please contact Ledger Support if you cannot use your device.

LedgerAPIError.title: Sorry, try again (API HTTP {{status}})
LedgerAPIError.description: Unsuccessful calls to the Ledger API server. Please try again.

LedgerAPIErrorWithMessage.title: {{message}}
LedgerAPIErrorWithMessage.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support if the problem persists.

LedgerAPINotAvailable.title: Sorry, {{currencyName}} services unavailable
LedgerAPINotAvailable.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support if the problem persists.

ManagerAppAlreadyInstalled.title: Sorry, that's already installed
ManagerAppAlreadyInstalled.description: Please check which apps are already installed on your device.

ManagerAppRelyOnBTC.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum apps needed
ManagerAppRelyOnBTC.description: Please install the latest Bitcoin and Ethereum apps first.

ManagerNotEnoughSpace.title: Not enough storage left
ManagerNotEnoughSpace.info: Please uninstall some apps to free up space for the {{app}} app.
ManagerNotEnoughSpace.description: Uninstalling apps has no impact on your assets.

install.title: App installation in progress
install.description: Quitting the Manager will terminate installation.

uninstall.title: App uninstall in progress
uninstall.description: Quitting the Manager will terminate uninstallation.

update.title: App update in progress
update.description: Quitting the Manager will terminate update.

ManagerUninstallBTCDep.title: Sorry, this app is needed
ManagerUninstallBTCDep.description: Uninstall the Bitcoin or Ethereum app last.

NetworkDown.title: Sorry, internet seems to be down

NoAddressesFound.title: Sorry, no account was found
NoAddressesFound.description: Something went wrong with the address calculation. Please contact Ledger Support if the problem persists.

NotEnoughBalance.title: Sorry, insufficient funds
NotEnoughBalance.description: Please make sure the account has enough funds.

NotEnoughGas.title: Insufficient ETH for network fee
NotEnoughGas.description: Please send some ETH to your account to pay for ERC20 token transactions.

NotEnoughBalanceInParentAccount.title: Insufficient balance in the parent account

NotEnoughBalanceBecauseDestinationNotCre.title: Minimum of {{minimalAmount}} needed to activate recipient address

PairingFailed.title: Pairing unsuccessful
PairingFailed.description: Please try again or consult our Bluetooth troubleshooting article.

SyncError.title: Synchronization error
SyncError.description: Some accounts could not be synchronized. Please consult our article on synchronization errors.

TimeoutError.title: Sorry, server took too long to respond

TimeoutTagged.title: Sorry, server took too long to respond ({{tag}})

TransactionRefusedOnDevice.title: Transaction refused on device
TransactionRefusedOnDevice.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support in case of doubt.

TransportError.title: Something went wrong. Please reconnect your device.

TransportStatusError.title: Something went wrong. Please reconnect your device.

TronNoFrozenForBandwidth.title: No assets to unfreeze
TronNoFrozenForBandwidth.description: You don't have Bandwidth assets to unfreeze.

TronNoFrozenForEnergy.title: No assets to unfreeze
TronNoFrozenForEnergy.description: You don't have Energy assets to unfreeze.

TronUnfreezeNotExpired.title: Unfreeze is not available yet
TronUnfreezeNotExpired.description: Please wait 3 days after your last Freeze operation.

TronInvalidVoteCount.title: Vote format is incorrect
TronInvalidVoteCount.description: You can only vote using round numbers.

TronNoReward.title: There is no reward to be claimed

TronInvalidFreezeAmount.title: Amount to freeze cannot be smaller than 1

TronSendTrc20ToNewAccountForbidden.title: Sending TRC20 to the new account will not activate it
TronSendTrc20ToNewAccountForbidden.description: To activate it, first send either TRX or TRC10 to the account. Then it can receive TRC20.

TronTransactionExpired.title: Transaction timeout expired
TronTransactionExpired.description: Transactions must be signed within 30 seconds. Please try again.

TronNotEnoughEnergy.title: Not enough Energy to send this token

UpdateYourApp.title: App update needed
UpdateYourApp.description: Please uninstall then reinstall the {{managerAppName}} app in the Manager.

UserRefusedAllowManager.title: Manager disabled on device
UserRefusedAllowManager.description: Please enable the Manager on your device, then try again.

UserRefusedAddress.title: Receive address rejected
UserRefusedAddress.description: You rejected the address. Please contact Ledger Support if in doubt.

UserRefusedDeviceNameChange.title: Rename canceled on device
UserRefusedDeviceNameChange.description: You canceled the rename. Please try again.

UserRefusedFirmwareUpdate.title: Firmware update canceled on device
UserRefusedFirmwareUpdate.description: You canceled the firmware update. Please retry or contact Ledger Support.

UserRefusedOnDevice.title: Operation canceled on device
UserRefusedOnDevice.description: You rejected the operation on the device.

WebsocketConnectionError.title: Sorry, connection failed
WebsocketConnectionError.description: Please try again with a better network connection (websocket error).

WebsocketConnectionFailed.title: Sorry, connection failed
WebsocketConnectionFailed.description: Please try again with a better network connection (websocket failed).

WrongDeviceForAccount.title: Sorry, wrong device for {{accountName}}
WrongDeviceForAccount.description: The connected device is not associated with the account selected. Please connect the corresponding device.

UnexpectedBootloader.title: Sorry, your device must not be in Bootloader mode
UnexpectedBootloader.description: Please restart your device without touching the buttons when the logo appears. Contact Ledger Support if the problem persists.

UnavailableTezosOriginatedAccountReceive.title: Cannot receive in subaccounts. Please select the parent account.
UnavailableTezosOriginatedAccountReceive.description: If you want to receive funds, please use the parent account

UnavailableTezosOriginatedAccountSend.title: Cannot send from subaccounts yet
UnavailableTezosOriginatedAccountSend.description: This feature will be added at a later stage due to changes recently introduced by the Babylon update.

RecommendUndelegation.title: Please undelegate the account before emptying it

NotSupportedLegacyAddress.title: The legacy address format is no longer supported

StellarMemoRecommended.title: A memo may be needed when sending to this recipient

StratisDown2021Warning.description: The Stratis blockchain evolved and may no longer work correctly. Support for the original Stratis blockchain will be maintained until 16 October 2021.

SwapGenericAPIError.title: Exchange rate expired
SwapGenericAPIError.description: You must confirm the swap before the timer runs out. The exchange rate remains valid for a fixed duration.

generic.title: {{message}}
generic.description: Something went wrong. Please retry or contact Ledger Support if the problem persists.

bluetooth.required: Sorry, it looks like Bluetooth is disabled
bluetooth.locationRequiredTitle: Location is required for Bluetooth LE
bluetooth.locationRequiredMessage: On Android location permission is required to list Bluetooth LE devices.
bluetooth.checkEnabled: Please enable Bluetooth in your phone settings.

location.disabled: Ledger Live requires location services to pair your device through Bluethooth.
location.noInfos: Ledger does not access your location information.

signout.confirm: Are you sure you want to sign out?
signout.disclaimer: All account data will be removed from your phone.

biometrics.title: {{biometricsType}} unlock failed
biometrics.authenticate: Please authenticate with the Ledger Live app

failed.denied: Auth Security was not enabled because your phone failed to authenticate.
failed.title: Authentication failed

unlock.biometricsTitle: Please authenticate with the Ledger Live app
unlock.title: Welcome back

reset.description: Please uninstall then reinstall the app on your phone to delete Ledger Live data, including accounts and settings.

carousel.title: Close banner?
carousel.description: We'll inform you of any new announcements.

academy.description: Everything you need to know about crypto

stakeCosmos.title: Stake COSMOS
stakeCosmos.description: Delegate your ATOM earn rewards today.

backupPack.description: Secure your assets with a Nano X and Nano S.

swap.description: Securely exchange one crypto for another.

algorand.title: Algorand
algorand.description: Earn ALGO rewards with each transaction.

vote.description: Vote directly from your Ledger Wallet.

blackfriday.title: BLACK FRIDAY
blackfriday.description: Enjoy 40% off with promo code BLACKFRIDAY20

stepWelcome.title: Welcome to Ledger
stepWelcome.subtitle: Administra de manera segura tus criptomonedas desde tu smartphone.

warning.title: Comenzar en español
warning.desc: Estamos añadiendo idiomas adicionales para ayudarte a aprender a utilizar Ledger. Por favor, ten en cuenta que actualmente el resto de la experiencia Ledger solo está disponible en inglés.

firstUse.title: ¿Es la primera vez que utilizas este Nano?
firstUse.label: Primera vez
firstUse.subTitle: Inicializa un nuevo Nano

devicePairing.title: ¿Ya dispones de una frase de contraseña?
devicePairing.label: Emparejamiento del dispositivo
devicePairing.subTitle: Conecta tu Nano
devicePairing.desc: ¿Tu dispositivo ya está configurado? ¡Conéctalo a tu app!

desktopSync.title: ¿Ya dispones de una frase de contraseña?
desktopSync.label: Sincronización con ordenador
desktopSync.subTitle: Sincroniza tus criptomonedas desde tu aplicación de escritorio
desktopSync.desc: ¿Ya tienes la aplicación de escritorio? ¡Sincronízala para administrar tus criptomonedas desde tu teléfono inteligente!

restoreDevice.label: Restaurar dispositivo
restoreDevice.subTitle: Restaura tu frase de contraseña en un nuevo dispositivo
restoreDevice.desc: ¡Utiliza una frase de contraseña existente para restaurar tus claves privadas en un nuevo Nano!

0.label: Nociones básicas
0.title: Accede a tus criptomonedas
0.desc: Tus activos criptográficos se almacenan en blockchain. Necesitas una clave privada para acceder a ellos y administrarlos.

1.label: Nociones básicas
1.title: Posee tu clave privada
1.desc: Tu clave privada se almacena dentro de tu Nano. Debes ser su único propietario para mantener el control sobre tu dinero.

2.label: Nociones básicas
2.title: Permanece sin conexión
2.desc: Tu Nano funciona como una cartera de «almacenamiento en frío». Esto significa que nunca expone tu clave privada en línea, incluso cuando utilizas la app.

3.label: Nociones básicas
3.title: Valida transacciones
3.desc: Ledger Live te permite comprar, vender, administrar, intercambiar y adquirir criptomonedas permaneciendo protegido. Deberás validar cada transacción de criptomonedas con tu Nano.

4.label: Nociones básicas
4.title: ¡Vamos a configurar tu Nano!
4.desc: Empezaremos por configurar la seguridad de tu Nano.

2.label: Elige un entorno seguro y tranquilo en el que puedas estar a solas.

warning.title: Por favor, presta atención
warning.desc: Asegúrate de seguir las instrucciones de esta app para cada etapa del proceso.

nanoX.label: Enciende tu dispositivo presionando el botón negro durante 1 segundo.

nanoS.label: Enciende tu dispositivo conectándolo al puerto USB de tu teléfono.

blue.label: Enciende tu dispositivo conectándolo al puerto USB de tu teléfono y pulsando el botón de encendido.

1.title: Navegar
1.label: Aprende a interactuar con tu dispositivo mediante la lectura de las instrucciones en pantalla.

2.title: Seleccionar “Set up as new device”
2.label: Presiona ambos botones simultáneamente para validar la selección.

3.title: Seguir las instrucciones
3.label: Vuelve aquí para seguir las instrucciones sobre tu código PIN.

pinCode.title: Código PIN
pinCode.desc: Tu código PIN es la primera capa de seguridad. Protege físicamente el acceso a tu Nano y a tus claves privadas. Tu código PIN debe tener entre 4 y 8 dígitos.
pinCode.checkboxDesc: Comprendo que debo elegir mi código PIN por mi cuenta y mantenerlo secreto.

0.title: Elige un código PIN
0.label: Pulsa el botón izquierdo o derecho para cambiar los dígitos. Presiona ambos botones para validar un dígito. Selecciona <1></1> para confirmar tu código PIN. Selecciona <2></2> para borrar un dígito.

1.title: Confirmar código PIN
1.label: Introduce tu código PIN para confirmarlo.

0.label: Elige siempre un código PIN por tu cuenta.

1.label: Introduce siempre tu código PIN sin que te observen.

2.label: Si lo necesitas, puedes modificar tu código PIN.

3.label: El dispositivo se reiniciará si introduces tres veces seguidas un código PIN incorrecto.

4.label: Nunca utilices un código PIN fácil como 0000, 123456, 55555555.

5.label: Nunca compartas tu código PIN con nadie. Ni siquiera con Ledger.

6.label: Nunca utilices un código PIN que no elegiste por tu cuenta.

7.label: Nunca almacenes tu código PIN en un ordenador o un smartphone.

recoveryPhrase.title: Frase de contraseña
recoveryPhrase.desc: Tu frase de contraseña es una lista secreta de 24 palabras que hace una copia de seguridad de tus claves privadas.
recoveryPhrase.desc_1: Tu Nano genera una frase de contraseña única. Ledger no conserva una copia de la misma.
recoveryPhrase.checkboxDesc: Comprendo que si pierdo la frase de contraseña no podré acceder a mis criptomonedas en caso de que pierda acceso a mi Nano.

infoModal.title: ¿Cómo funciona una frase de contraseña?
infoModal.desc: Tu frase de contraseña funciona como una llave maestra única. Tu dispositivo Ledger la utiliza para calcular claves privadas para cada activo criptográfico que posees.
infoModal.desc_1: Para restaurar el acceso a tus criptomonedas, cualquier cartera puede calcular las mismas claves privadas a partir de tu frase de contraseña.
infoModal.link: Más información acerca del funcionamiento de la frase de contraseña
infoModal.title_1: ¿Qué pasa si pierdo acceso a mi Nano?

0.label: Hazte con una nueva cartera física.

1.label: Selecciona «Restore recovery phrase on a new device» en la app Ledger.

2.label: Introduce tu frase de contraseña en tu nuevo dispositivo para restaurar el acceso a tus criptomonedas.

0.title: Abre el formulario de recuperación
0.label: Toma un formulario de recuperación vacío, incluido con tu Nano. Por favor, ponte en contacto con el servicio de asistencia de Ledger si el formulario de recuperación incluido no está vacío.

1.title: Apunta todas las palabras
1.label: Escribe la palabra n. º 1 que se muestra en tu Nano en la posición n. º 1 de tu formulario de recuperación. A continuación, pulsa el botón derecho de tu Nano para mostrar la palabra n. º 2 y escríbela en la posición n. º 2.
1.label_1: Repite este proceso para todas las palabras respetando cuidadosamente el orden y la ortografía. Pulsa el botón izquierdo de tu Nano para comprobar si has cometido algún error.

2.title: Confirma tu frase de contraseña
2.label: Desplázate por las palabras hasta que encuentres la palabra n. º 1 al pulsar el botón derecho. Valida presionando ambos botones.

3.title: ¡Repite lo mismo con todas las palabras!

hideRecoveryPhrase.title: Oculta tu frase de contraseña
hideRecoveryPhrase.desc: Tu frase de contraseña es la única manera de recuperar tus monedas, debes conservarla en un lugar seguro.

0.label: Introduce estas palabras únicamente en una cartera física, no en ordenadores ni en smartphones.

1.label: Nunca compartas tus 24 palabras con nadie, ni siquiera con Ledger.

infoModal.label: Aprende cómo ocultarla
infoModal.title: ¿Dónde debo guardar mi frase de contraseña?

0.label: <1>NUNCA</1> la introduzcas en un ordenador, un smartphone o cualquier otro dispositivo. No tomes una foto de ella.

2.label: Guárdala <1>EN TODO MOMENTO</1> en un lugar seguro, fuera de la vista.

3.label: Ledger nunca te pedirá tu frase de contraseña.

4.label: Si alguien te la pide, asume que es un timo.

warning.title: ¡Hora de jugar!
warning.desc: Responde a 3 sencillas preguntas para evitar confusiones comunes acerca de tu cartera física.

importRecoveryPhrase.title: Restaurar a partir de tu frase de contraseña
importRecoveryPhrase.desc: Restaura tu Nano a partir de tu frase de contraseña para restaurar, reemplazar o hacer una copia de seguridad de tu cartera física Ledger.
importRecoveryPhrase.desc_1: Tu Nano restaurará tus claves privadas y podrás acceder a tus criptomonedas y administrarlas.

warning.title: Recomendamos utilizar únicamente frases de contraseña generadas por Ledger
warning.desc: Ledger no puede garantizar la seguridad de frases de contraseña externas. Recomendamos configurar tu Nano como nuevo dispositivo si tu frase de contraseña no ha sido generada por Ledger.

nanoX.label: Enciende tu dispositivo presionando el botón negro durante 1 segundo.

nanoS.label: Enciende tu dispositivo conectándolo al puerto USB de tu teléfono.

blue.label: Enciende tu dispositivo conectándolo al puerto USB de tu teléfono y pulsando el botón de encendido.

1.title: Navegar
1.label: Aprende a interactuar con tu dispositivo mediante la lectura de las instrucciones en pantalla.

2.title: Selecciona “Restore from recovery phrase”
2.label: Presiona ambos botones simultáneamente para validar la selección.

3.title: Seguir las instrucciones
3.label: Vuelve aquí para seguir las instrucciones sobre tu código PIN.

existingRecoveryPhrase.title: Introduce tu frase de contraseña
existingRecoveryPhrase.paragraph1: Tu frase de contraseña es la lista secreta de palabras de la que guardaste una copia de seguridad cuando configuraste tu cartera por primera vez.
existingRecoveryPhrase.paragraph2: Ledger no conserva una copia de tu frase de contraseña.
existingRecoveryPhrase.checkboxDesc: Comprendo que si pierdo esta frase de contraseña no podré acceder a mis criptomonedas en caso de que pierda acceso a mi Nano.

1.title: Selecciona la longitud de la frase de contraseña
1.label: Tus frases de contraseña pueden tener 12, 18 o 24 palabras. Debes introducir todas las palabras para acceder a tus criptomonedas.

2.title: Introduce la palabra n.º 1...
2.label: Introduce las primeras letras de la palabra n.º 1 seleccionándolas con el botón derecho o izquierdo. Presiona ambos botones para confirmar cada letra.

3.title: Confirma la palabra n.º 1...
3.label: Elige la palabra n.º 1 de entre las sugeridas. Presiona ambos botones para validarla.

4.title: ¡Repite lo mismo para todas las palabras!

nanoX.title: Emparejar tu Nano
nanoX.desc: Esta es la primera vez que configuras tu Nano con este teléfono. Conectemos rápidamente tu dispositivo.

nanoS.title: Conecta tu Nano
nanoS.desc: Esta es la primera vez que configuras tu Nano con este teléfono. Conectemos rápidamente tu dispositivo.

blue.title: Conecta tu Blue
blue.desc: Esta es la primera vez que configuras tu Blue con este teléfono. Conectemos rápidamente tu dispositivo.

infoModal.title: ¿Dónde puedo encontrar el nombre de mi dispositivo?
infoModal.desc: En tu dispositivo, selecciona Settings > General > Device name.
infoModal.title_2: ¿Cómo utilizo mi Nano X sin Bluetooth?
infoModal.desc_1: Utiliza un <1>cable OTG</1> para conectar tu Ledger Nano X a tu teléfono inteligente Android (no admite iOS). Administra tus criptomonedas con la app Ledger Live o cualquier otra app (web) compatible.

0.label: Asegúrate de que el Bluetooth está activado en tu teléfono inteligente y en tu Ledger Nano X. Tu Ledger Nano X debe estar en el Dashboard, la ventana de inicio principal.

1.label: <1>{{Os}}</1>: asegúrate de que los servicios de ubicación están activados para Ledger Live en los ajustes de tu teléfono. Ledger Live nunca utiliza la información de tu ubicación, pero se trata de un requisito para Bluetooth en {{Os}}.

2.label: Si tienes algún problema de emparejamiento mediante Bluetooth, por favor consulta el siguiente artículo

errorInfoModal.title: ¿Algo salió mal?
errorInfoModal.desc: Si estás teniendo problemas de Bluetooth con tu Nano X, por favor elimina el emparejamiento y olvida el dispositivo Nano X en tu teléfono. A continuación, intenta emparejar de nuevo.
errorInfoModal.desc_1: Puede pasar un tiempo antes de que se muestre la solicitud de emparejamiento de Bluetooth. Asegúrate de que verificas y confirmas el código de emparejamiento tanto en tu Nano X como en tu teléfono.
errorInfoModal.desc_2: Comprueba en los ajustes de Bluetooth de tu teléfono si se detecta Ledger Nano X. Si no se detecta, asegúrate de que habilitas el Bluetooth en tu Ledger Nano X.
errorInfoModal.desc_4: Si tu app de móvil no detecta el Ledger Nano X al intentar emparejarlo, por favor prueba la siguiente solución:
errorInfoModal.desc_5: La app Ledger para móvil te pide que permitas los servicios de ubicación cuando no estén ya activados, pero en algunos modelos de teléfono esto no siempre se detecta correctamente. Por favor, ten en cuenta que la app Ledger para móvil nunca utiliza tu información de ubicación, este permiso se necesita simplemente para Bluetooth en Android.
errorInfoModal.desc_6: Algunos usuarios han informado de que han solucionado sus problemas de conexión actualizando la versión de Android instalada en su teléfono a una más nueva. Por favor, consulta al fabricante de tu teléfono si existe una actualización disponible.

0.label: Navega a las opciones del sistema para la app Ledger Live en tu teléfono Android.

1.label: Permite el uso de los servicios de ubicación.

2.label: Vuelve a la app del móvil.

3.label: Comprueba si se detecta tu Nano X.

stepImportAccounts.title: Sincroniza tus criptomonedas desde el ordenador
stepImportAccounts.desc: Si ya tienes tus criptomonedas configuradas en la aplicación de escritorio Ledger, puedes sincronizarlas para administrarlas desde tu teléfono.

0.label: En tu aplicación de escritorio, selecciona <1>Settings > Accounts > Account export</1>.

1.label: Escanea el código LiveQR con tu teléfono.

2.label: Selecciona las cuentas de criptomonedas para importar.

warning.title: Es necesario sincronizar manualmente tus aplicaciones de escritorio y de móvil.
warning.desc: Ledger Live respeta tu privacidad y almacena tus datos de manera local. Si cambias las cuentas y la configuración en tu teléfono, deberás hacer lo mismo en tu ordenador, y viceversa. Tus transacciones se mantienen sincronizadas con blockchain.

stepSetupPin.step1: Enciende tu {{fullDeviceName}} y sigue las instrucciones.
stepSetupPin.step1-nanoS: Conecta tu {{fullDeviceName}} a tu teléfono por medio de un cable OTG.
stepSetupPin.step2: Press both buttons together to select <1><1>Setup as a new device.</1></1>
stepSetupPin.step2-restore: Press both buttons together to select <1><1>Restore from recovery phrase.</1></1>
stepSetupPin.step3: Press left or right button to select a digit. Press buttons together to confirm.

modal.step3: Never use a device with a PIN or recovery phrase already setup

stepWriteRecovery.step1: Write <1><1>Word #1</1></1> in entry 1 on a blank Recovery sheet
stepWriteRecovery.step2: Press the right button and continue to write down all 24 words.
stepWriteRecovery.step3: Confirm each word of your recovery phrase: select it then confirm it by pressing both buttons together.

modal.step1: Store your 24-word recovery phrase in a safe place, out of sight.
modal.step2: Make sure you are the only person to have the recovery phrase.
modal.step3: Ledger does not save your recovery phrase.
modal.step4: Never use a device with a recovery phrase or PIN already setup.

stepPassword.desc: Set a password to protect Ledger Live data on your phone.

modal.step1: Keep your password safe. Do not share it.
modal.step2: Keep your password safe. Losing it means resetting Ledger Live and loading the accounts again.
modal.step3: Resetting Ledger Live has no impact on your crypto assets.

stepFinish.title: ¡Tu dispositivo está listo!
stepFinish.desc: Install apps on your device and manage your portfolio

coins.title: Como usuario de Ledger, mis criptomonedas se almacenan:

modal.text: Tus criptomonedas siempre se almacenan en blockchain. Tu cartera física solo contiene tu clave privada, que te da acceso a tus criptomonedas.

recoveryPhrase.title: Si mi frase de contraseña deja de estar segura o de ser privada...

answers.correct: Mis criptomonedas ya no están seguras y necesito transferirlas a un lugar seguro
answers.wrong: Ningún problema, Ledger me manda una copia

modal.text:
Cualquiera que sepa tu frase de contraseña puede robar tus activos criptográficos.
Si la pierdes, debes transferir rápidamente tus criptomonedas a un lugar seguro.

privateKey.title: Cuando conecto mi Nano a la app Ledger, mi clave privada...

modal.text: Tus claves privadas siempre permanecen sin conexión en tu cartera de Nano. Incluso cuando te conectas a tu cartera de Nano, la app de Ledger no puede acceder a tus claves privadas. Siempre tendrás que autorizar físicamente cada transacción en tu dispositivo.

final.successText: Estás listo/a para administrar de forma segura tus criptomonedas. ¡Solo te queda un breve paso!
final.failText: No te preocupes, Ledger está aquí para guiarte en este proceso. Pronto te sentirás del todo seguro/a acerca de la seguridad de tus criptomonedas. ¡Solo te queda un breve paso!

accounts.title: Accounts

about.title: About
about.desc: App information, terms and conditions, and privacy policy.
about.appDescription: With Ledger Live, Secure, Buy, Sell, Exchange, Grow and Manage your crypto. All-in-one place.
about.termsConditionsDesc: By using Ledger Live you are deemed to have accepted our terms and conditions.

liveReview.title: Rate the app!

help.title: Help
help.desc: Learn more about Ledger Live or how to get help.
help.supportDesc: If you have a problem, get help using Ledger Live with your hardware wallet.
help.configureDeviceDesc: Set up as a new device or restore an existing device. Accounts and settings are preserved.
help.clearCacheDesc: The transactions on the network will be scanned and your accounts will be recalculated.
help.clearCacheModalDesc: A fresh and complete scan of transactions on the network will be done. Account histories will be rebuilt and balances will be recalculated.
help.exportLogsDesc: Exporting Ledger Live logs may help troubleshooting.
help.hardResetDesc: This has no impact on your assets. Erases all data in Ledger Live, including account data, transaction histories and settings. Use your Ledger device to reload and manage your crypto assets on an empty Ledger Live.
help.repairDeviceDesc: If you have an issue updating your device and cannot resume updates, you can try this to repair your device.

experimental.title: Experimental features
experimental.desc: Try out the Experimental features and let us know what you think.
experimental.disclaimer: These are Experimental features provided on an "as is" basis for our community of tech enthusiasts. They may change, break or be removed at any time. By enabling them, you agree to use them at your own risk.

overview.title: Ledger Live accounts update
overview.subtitle: New features in Ledger Live means your accounts need to be updated
overview.notice: {{accountCount}} account could not be updated. Please connect the device associated to the account below.
overview.notice_plural: {{accountCount}} accounts could not be updated. Please connect the device associated to the accounts below.

done.title: {{currency}} update complete

highFees.title: High fees on Ethereum
highFees.description: Due to congestion on the Ethereum network, you may experience high fees when issuing transactions.

account.currencyAPYTooltip: Yearly return rate of a deposit that’s continuously compounded
account.accruedInterestsTooltip: Interest generated on your lent assets
account.interestEarnedTooltip: Interest you have earned after withdrawal

banners.needApproval: You need to approve this account before being able to lend assets.
banners.fullyApproved: You have fully approved this account. You can reduce the amount at a fee.
banners.approvedCanReduce: You have approved <0>{{value}}</0> on this account. You can reduce the amount at a fee.
banners.approvedButNotEnough: You have approved <0>{{value}}</0> on this account.
banners.approving: You can deposit assets once the account approval is confirmed.
banners.notEnough: You must increase the limit approved on your account to lend.

dashboard.emptySateDescription: You can lend assets directly from your Ethereum accounts and earn interest.

closedLoans.description: View all your withdrawn loans and the interest you have earned.

history.description: View the history of all your loan transactions.

terms.label: Lend crypto
terms.title: Lend assets on the Compound Protocol
terms.description: The Compound protocol allows you to lend and borrow assets on the Ethereum network. You can lend assets and earn interest directly from your Ledger acccount.
terms.switchLabel: I have read and agree with the <0><0>Terms of Use</0></0>.

1.label: Step 1/3
1.title: Approving an account allows the protocol to process future loans.
1.description: You need to authorize the Compound smart contract to transfer up to a certain amount of assets to the protocol. Enabling an account gives permission to the protocol to process future loans.

2.label: Step 2/3
2.title: Deposit assets to earn interest.
2.description: Once an account is approved, you can select the amount of assets you want to lend and issue a transaction to the protocol. Interest accrue immediately after the transaction is confirmed.

3.label: Step 3/3
3.title: Withdraw assets at any time.
3.description: You can withdraw your assets and earned interest at any time, partially or entirely, directly from your Ledger account.

info.title: You don’t have {{ name }} account.
info.description: In order to deposit funds and lend crypto you need a {{ name }} account. Please Receive funds on your Ethereum address.

info.title: This account is not approved
info.description: You need to approve an account before being able to lend this asset.

selectAccount.enabledAccountsNoLimit: You have {{number}} account that approved an unlimited amount of {{ currency }}
selectAccount.enabledAccountsNoLimit_plural: You have {{number}} accounts that approved an unlimited amount of {{ currency }}
selectAccount.noEnabledAccounts: You need to approve an account before you can lend.

validation.info: The approval was sent to the network for confirmation. You’ll be able to issue loans once it is confirmed.

info.description: Delegate your Algo to earn rewards while keeping full security and control on your assets.

steps.0: A minimum balance of 1 Algo is required to receive rewards.
steps.1: Increase the account’s balance to increase rewards.
steps.2: Perform a transaction to or from the account to claim rewards.

starter.title: Congratulations! You earned {{amount}}. Continue to claim your rewards.
starter.warning: You will be prompted to generate an empty transaction to your account. This will add your current rewards to your balance at the minimal cost of the transaction fees.

success.title: Rewards successfully claimed!
success.text: Your rewards were added to your available balance.

verification.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please check back in a few minutes to make sure your transaction did not go through before trying again.

warning.title: Asset already added
warning.description: You already have {{token}} asset in your Algorand account.

success.title: {{token}} asset successfully added!
success.text: You can now receive and send {{token}} assets on your Algorand account.

verification.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please check back in a few minutes to make sure your transaction did not go through before trying again.

delegated.title: Delegated assets
delegated.description: Delegated assets are used for Cosmos voting. This is your total number of votes.

undelegating.title: Undelegating
undelegating.description: Undelegated assets are in a timelock of 21 days, before being available.

delegationUnavailable.title: Delegation unavailable
delegationUnavailable.description: Not enough available balance in your account to start a new delegation.

delegation.delegationEarn: You can earn ATOM rewards by delegating your assets.

starter.description: Delegate your ATOM to earn rewards securely, keeping control of your assets.

steps.1: You will have to wait 21 days for the undelegation to complete.
steps.2: Delegate securely with your Ledger device.

warning.description: Choose your validator wisely: Part of your delegated assets may be irrevocably lost if the validator does not behave appropriately.

success.title: You have successfully delegated your assets
success.text: Your account balance will be updated once the network confirms the transaction.

verification.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please wait a moment then check the transaction history before trying again.

success.title: You have successfully redelegated your assets
success.text: Your account balance will be updated when the network confirms the transaction.

verification.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please wait a moment then check the transaction history before trying again.

success.title: You have successfully undelegated your assets
success.text: Your account balance will be updated when the network confirms the transaction.

verification.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please wait a moment then check the transaction history before trying again.

method.claimRewardInfo: They will be claimed now and added to your available balance.
method.claimRewardCompoundInfo: They will be claimed now and automatically delegated to the same validator.
method.claimRewardTooltip: Rewards will be added to the available balance
method.claimRewardCompoundTooltip: Rewards will be added to the delegated amount

success.title: You have successfully claimed your rewards. They were added to your available balance.

AccountHeader.title: You can earn rewards by delegating your account

voting.delegationEarn: You can now earn rewards by freezing and voting.
voting.title: Claim rewards

votes.title: Votes
votes.description: Cast your votes for one or more Representatives to start earning rewards.

remainingVotes.title: You still have votes remaining
remainingVotes.description: Cast your remaining votes to earn more rewards.

started.title: Vote
started.description: Vote for one or more Super Representatives to start earning rewards.

starter.title: Earn rewards
starter.description: Delegate TRX to a third party candidate to earn rewards. Click on continue to freeze assets and vote.

bullet.access: You can access your assets 3 days after freezing.
bullet.ledger: Delegate securely with your Ledger device.

freeze.title: Freeze
freeze.description: Freeze TRX to earn Bandwidth or Energy. You can also vote for Super Representatives.

unfreeze.title: Unfreeze
unfreeze.description: Unfreeze TRX to add them back to your available balance. You will no longer earn rewards.

vote.title: Vote
vote.description: Cast votes for Super Representatives to earn rewards.

frozen.title: Frozen
frozen.description: Frozen assets are used for Tron voting. This is your total number of votes.

bandwidth.title: Bandwidth
bandwidth.description: Bandwidth points are used to make transactions instead of paying TRX network fees. Choose Bandwidth to increase your daily free transactions.

energy.title: Energy
energy.description: Energy points are required to execute smart contracts. If you don't run smart contracts, there is no need to have rewards in Energy points.

claimRewards.title: Voting rewards
claimRewards.description: The TRX generated as rewards during block production can be claimed every 24 hours.

superRepresentative.title: Super Representatives (SR)
superRepresentative.description: Super Representatives play a key role in governing the TRON community by ensuring basic functions, e.g. block generation and bookkeeping.

candidates.title: Candidates
candidates.description: 127 individuals elected through voting by the entire token-holder community. Votes are sampled every 6 hours.

memo.title: Memo
memo.warning: When using a Memo, carefully verify the type with the recipient.

delegation.delegationSendWarnDesc: The amount to be sent will be deducted from your delegated account.
delegation.delegationReceiveWarnDesc: The amount received in a delegated account will be added to the total staked amount. Choose another account if you want to avoid this.
delegation.warnDelegation: Delegating your voting rights does not guarantee any rewards from your validator.
delegation.termsAndPrivacy: I have read and I accept the <1>Ledger Live Terms of Use</1> and <3>Privacy Policy</3>.

started.title: Earn rewards
started.description: Delegate your Tezos account to a third-party validator to earn rewards securely, keeping control of your assets.

steps.1: You can manage your assets at all times.
steps.2: Delegate securely with your Ledger device.

broadcastSuccessDescription.delegate: Delegation transaction broadcasted successfully. You should earn your first rewards in around 40 days, depending on the validator.
broadcastSuccessDescription.undelegate: Your account delegation will end when the operation is confirmed. You can delegate your account again at any time.
